  • Method Details

    • addNewPromoCode

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @PostMapping("new") public PromoCodeModel addNewPromoCode(PromoCodeModel promoCodeModel)

    • deletePromoCode

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @DeleteMapping("{promoId}") public void deletePromoCode(@PathVariable(name="promoId") String serialNumber)

    • updatePromoCode

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @PatchMapping("{promoId}") public PromoCodeModel updatePromoCode(@PathVariable(name="promoId") String promoCodeId, @RequestParam("percentage") String newPromoCodeAmountPercentage)

    • getPromoCodeById

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("{promoId}") public PromoCodeModel getPromoCodeById(@PathVariable(name="promoId") String promoCodeId)

    • listAllPromoCodes

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("all") public List<PromoCodeModel> listAllPromoCodes()

    • findAllPromoCodesFromUser

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("{userId}/all") public List<PromoCodeModel> findAllPromoCodesFromUser(@PathVariable(name="userId") String userId)

    • findAllPromoCodesFromAccomodation

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("accomodations/{regNumber}/all") public List<PromoCodeModel> findAllPromoCodesFromAccomodation(@PathVariable(name="regNumber") String accomodationRegisterNumber)

    • checkPromoCodeIsValid

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("{regNumber}/exists") public PromoCodeModel checkPromoCodeIsValid(@PathVariable(name="regNumber") String accomodationRegisterNumber, @RequestParam(name="code") String promoCode)
